00018 @define('ALWAYS_PROMPT_CREATE_PAGE', false);    // invoke the "create page" controller when trying to access a non-existing page even if the user is not logged in yet (otherwise they receive a 404)
00019 @define('AUTH_METHOD', 'digest');                       // can be digest, basic or none
00020

00022 // instead rename file user-config.inc.php-dist to user-config.inc.php

00027 @define('BASE_URL', '');                                        // auto-detected if empty (don't use BASE_URL in custom code but rather base_url() below)
00028 @define('CACHE_TIME', 60*60);                           // cache time in seconds (zero to disable)
00029 //@define('CACHE_TIME', 0);                             // cache time in seconds (zero to disable)

00035 @define('IE8_COMPAT', true);                            // try to be compatible with Internet Explorer 8 in viewing mode (also make sure that TEXT_USE_WOFF_FONTS is set to false)
00036 @define('JQUERY', 'js/jquery-1.5.2.min.js');// can be an absolute url

00067 /**
00068  *      use this function to get the site's base url
00069  *
00070  *      @return string base url (not html-encoded)
00071  */
00072 function base_url()
00073 {
00074         global $base_url_cached;
00075 
00076         $temp = BASE_URL;
00077         if (!empty($temp)) {
00078                 return $temp;
00079         } elseif (!isset($base_url_cached)) {
00080                 if (empty($_SERVER['HTTPS'])) {
00081                         $base_url_cached = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
00082                         if ($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] != '80') {
00083                                 $base_url_cached .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
00084                         }
00085                 } else {
00086                         $base_url_cached = 'https://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
00087                         if ($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] != '443') {
00088                                 $base_url_cached .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091                 $base_url_cached .= dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']);
00092                 // make sure we have a trailing slash at the end
00093                 if (substr($base_url_cached, -1) != '/') {
00094                         $base_url_cached .= '/';
00095                 }
00096         }
00097 
00098         return $base_url_cached;
00099 }
